summary: A vicious Kansas City slaughterhouse owner and his hick family are having a bloody "beef" with the Chicago crime syndicate over profits from their joint illegal operations. Top enforcer Nick Devlin is sent to straighten things out.
cast: Lee Marvin|Gene Hackman|Angel Tompkins|Gregory Walcott|Sissy Spacek|Janit Baldwin|Bill Morey|Clint Ellison|Howard Platt|Les Lannom|Eddie Egan|Therese Reinsch|Bob Wilson|Gordon Signer|Gladys Watson|Hugh Gillin|E. Lund|David Savage|Craig Chapman|Jim Taksas|Wayne Savagne|Jerry Tracey|Judy Williams
title: Carne viva
